promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple deer dark-type pokemon with dark hooves. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Stagnox, a a massive simple deer dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Clamp. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "dark" or "Stagnox". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, deer-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Found in cavernous realms, this majestic creature uses its Dark Clamp ability to surprise prey, navigating stealthily with impressive horns.
